member.name: M:Store.Controllers.CatalogController.SetUsedValue(System.Object@,System.String)
member.summary: Set value, which will be used into given object and to Session, that it is remember even if page is changed
member.param: name which will be used for session key

member.name: M:Store.Controllers.CatalogController.SetUsedValue(System.Object@,System.String,System.Object)
member.summary: Set value, which will be used, into given object and to Session, that it is remember even if page is changed. If value is not found use given default.
member.param: name which will be used for session key
Value is used, if value and session does not have value
